entries.title: Madden NFL 23 will cut CPR touchdown celebration following Damar Hamlin's cardiac arrest
entries.description: The three-player celebration will be removed in a future update.

entries.title: Yikes, hackers are hiding malware inside a fake Pokémon NFT card game
entries.description: Pokémon Card Game isn't a real PC game, just a clever trap by hackers.

entries.title: New OBS feature lets you stream better video for less bandwidth
entries.description: OBS 29 adds AV1 encoding support for new AMD and Intel GPUs, among other improvements.

entries.title: Hearthstone Battlegrounds is getting 32 new minions next week, many of whom stink
entries.description: Season 3 will introduce the Undead, as well as dual-tribe minions.

entries.title: Fortnite on the fritz as Epic struggles to squish multiple major bugs
entries.description: It's fixed some but not yet all, and login issues persist.

entries.title: The Last of Us TV show is a massive critical hit
entries.description: Multiple reviewers have called it the best videogame adaptation ever.

entries.title: Coinbase lays off nearly 1,000 more employees, blaming FTX 'contagion' and economic downturn
entries.description: The company plans to reduce operating expenses by 25 percent.

entries.title: Duelyst source code is now free for everyone, 'no strings attached'
entries.description: Counterplay Games is releasing the source and assets for its critically acclaimed CCG for developers to use as they like.

entries.title: 2023 is the year for a small, tactical upgrade to your PC
entries.description: You don't have to build a whole new rig (or buy an overpriced graphics card) to get a major speed boost.

entries.title: 18 games the PC Gamer team can't wait to play in 2023
entries.description: These are the PC games we're looking forward to this year.

entries.title: Marvel's Midnight Suns has competition from an indie game with an extremely similar name and premise
entries.description: Path of the Midnight Sun has nothing to do with the Firaxis game but ticks a lot of the same boxes.

entries.title: Nvidia and Valve want to make GeForce Now better on Steam Deck
entries.description: "But we don't have any announcements on a native app coming to Steam," says GFN boss.

entries.title: This foundational 1970s text adventure now has Google AI graphics
entries.description: Zork is where Infocom began, and laid the groundwork for generations of interactive fiction.

entries.title: As of today Windows 7, 8 and 8.1 are officially toast
entries.description: RIP: Support from Microsoft ends today, January 10, 2023.

entries.title: Forza Horizon 5 developers are working on a 'premium open-world game' at their new studio
entries.description: Including Forza Horizon 5 creative director Mike Brown.

entries.title: Everything we know about the Destiny 2 Lightfall expansion
entries.description: What to expect from Neptune and Neomuna.

entries.title: Shadow Power Upgrade
entries.description: The long-awaited update to Shadow's GTX 1080 baseline is too much for not enough.

entries.title: Logan Paul just did too many shitty things to fit in this headline
entries.description: The influencer threatened to sue a guy who called his crypto scam a crypto scam before backing down.

entries.title: AMD's lopsided Ryzen X3D CPUs need to be told which games want more cache or higher clock speeds
entries.description: Cache versus clocks, what's best for in-game frame rates?

entries.title: Meta is beginning to wind down support for the original Quest VR headset
entries.description: The Quest, first launched in 2019, will receive bug fixes and security updates for the remainder of 2023.

entries.title: Final Fantasy 16 producer wonders why people think a PC version exists (it's because Square Enix previously announced one)
entries.description: Naoki Yoshida seems to be conveniently ignoring that fact.

entries.title: Where to find the Lost Banana in World of Warcraft: Dragonflight
entries.description: This buff helps you earn the Toe Tension achievement.

entries.title: Kat VR C2+
entries.description: The next logical step in VR.

entries.title: Rumoured AI-enhanced Nvidia graphics driver could boost performance by 30%
entries.description: Yet more AI special sauce from Nvidia.

entries.title: The Callisto Protocol leaves key developers out of its credits
entries.description: Employees worked under crunch conditions, only to be erased from the game's history.

entries.title: Today's Wordle 570 answer and hint for Tuesday, January 10
entries.description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for the #570 puzzle.

entries.title: Asus's new gaming routers look like spiders, are Wi-Fi 7 ready
entries.description: Ready to give you extra gaming bandwidth. If you've got good enough net.

entries.title: MSI GeForce RTX 4080 Suprim X
entries.description: An excellent RTX 4080 that's handicapped by its price... as is the case for all Nvidia RTX 4080 cards.

entries.title: This adventure game tech demo with AI-generated art is impressive and disconcerting
entries.description: The demo is a convincing look at how an actual artist can use generative programs as a tool in their process, and that's what troubles me.
